definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Ex 3:8 brow, forehead;—´[[מ]] abs. Ez Eze 3:7, cstr. Ex 28:28, Je 3:3; sf. [[מִחְחְֲ]] Ez Eze 3:8, Is 48:4, [[מִחְחֶָוֹ]] Ez Eze 3:9; [[מִחְחוֹ]] Ex 28:38 + 4 t.; [[מִחְחָם]] Eze 3:8; pl. cstr. [[מִחְחוֹת]] Ez Eze 9:4; —brow, forehead, struck by stone fr. David's sling 1Sa 17:49, 1Sa 17:49; Aaron's forehead Ex 28:38, Ex 28:38; place where leprosy appears 2Ch 26:19, 2Ch 26:20; place for a distinguishing mark or cross Ez Eze 9:4; ´[[חִוְקְי־מ]] Eze 3:7 the house of Isr. are stout of forehead (i.e. obstinate; ‖[[קְשֵׁי־לֵב]]), cf. v:Eze 3:8; so [[מִחְהֲ ְנְחוּשָׁה]] Is 48:4 thy brow (is) brass (‖[[גִּיד בַּרְזֶל עָרְפְֶָּ]]); also of boldness, firmness of prophet v:Is 48:8, and v:Is 48:9 (but dele LXX Co); [[אִשָּׁה]] ´[[זוֹנׇה הָיׇה לָח מ]] Je 3:3, i.e. thou wast shameless (‖[[מֵאַנְתְּ הִכָּלֵם]]).
